privacy_policy_description: Learn how Wellio collects, uses, and protects your personal data
terms_description: Terms and conditions for using Wellio
intro_text: Welcome to Wellio. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our fitness and wellness application.
collect_fitness: Workout logs, exercise routines, and activity data
collect_nutrition: Nutrition logs, meal plans, and dietary preferences
collect_measurements: Body measurements, weight, and health metrics
collect_usage: App usage patterns and feature interactions
use_provide_service: To provide and maintain our fitness tracking services
use_personalize: To personalize your experience and recommendations
use_ai_insights: To generate AI-powered fitness insights (with your consent)
use_communicate: To communicate with you about updates and features
use_improve: To improve our services and develop new features
use_security: To ensure the security of your account and data
security_intro: We implement industry-leading security measures to protect your data:
security_audit: Comprehensive audit logging for sensitive data access
security_rls: Row-level security policies for data isolation
rights_intro: Under GDPR and other privacy regulations, you have the following rights:
right_access_desc: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you
right_rectify_desc: Request correction of inaccurate personal data
right_erasure_desc: Request deletion of your personal data
right_portability_desc: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
right_withdraw_desc: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
retention_text: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, or as required by law. You can configure your preferred data retention period in your Privacy Controls settings.
third_parties_intro: We may share data with trusted third parties for specific purposes:
third_party_hosting: Cloud infrastructure providers for data storage (encrypted at rest)
third_party_payments: Payment processors for subscription billing (PCI-DSS compliant)
contact_text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:
acceptance_text: By accessing or using Wellio, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
account_age: You must be at least 13 years old to use this service
account_accurate: You must provide accurate and complete information
account_secure: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
account_responsibility: You are responsible for all activities under your account
acceptable_intro: You agree to use Wellio responsibly and in accordance with these guidelines:
use_lawful: Use the service only for lawful purposes
use_accurate_data: Provide accurate health and fitness data
use_respect: Respect other users in community features
use_no_spam: Do not send spam or unsolicited messages
prohibited_illegal: Engaging in illegal activities or promoting violence
prohibited_harassment: Harassing, bullying, or threatening other users
payments_intro: Premium features require a paid subscription:
payments_billing: Subscriptions are billed on a recurring basis
payments_renewal: Subscriptions auto-renew unless cancelled before the renewal date
payments_cancel: You can cancel your subscription at any time from Settings
payments_refund: Refunds are provided in accordance with applicable consumer protection laws
health_disclaimer_text: IMPORTANT: Wellio is a fitness tracking and wellness application, NOT a medical device or service.
health_not_medical: Content and features are for informational purposes only
health_consult: Always consult qualified healthcare professionals before making health decisions
health_emergency: In case of medical emergency, contact emergency services immediately
ip_text: All content, features, and functionality of Wellio are owned by us and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You retain ownership of content you create but grant us a license to use it for providing our services.
termination_text: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms. You may delete your account at any time through Privacy Controls. Upon termination, your data will be deleted according to our retention policies.
liability_text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Wellio shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the service in the past 12 months.
governing_law_text: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is registered, without regard to conflict of law principles.
changes_text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or in-app notification. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
refund_policy_description: Our refund policy for subscriptions and purchases
refund_eligibility_desc: We want you to be satisfied with your purchase. Here's what qualifies for a refund:
non_eligible_3: Change of mind after significant usage
subscription_refund_window_desc: New subscriptions can be refunded within 14 days of purchase if unused or minimally used.
addon_refund_window_desc: Add-on purchases can be refunded within 7 days if the feature was not extensively used.
processing_time_desc: Approved refunds are processed within 5 business days to your original payment method.
refund_step_1: Go to Settings â†’ Orders & Payments
refund_step_2: Find the transaction you want refunded
refund_step_3: Click 'Request Refund' and provide a reason
refund_step_4: Our team will review and respond within 48 hours
contact_support_desc: Contact our support team if you have questions about your refund eligibility or need assistance with the refund process.
cancellation_policy_desc: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Here's what happens when you cancel:
cancellation_1: Your subscription remains active until the end of your billing period
cancellation_2: You won't be charged for the next billing cycle
cancellation_3: Premium features become unavailable after your period ends
billing_terms_description: Important information about how we bill for our services
auto_renewal_notice_desc: Subscriptions automatically renew at the end of each billing period unless cancelled. You will be notified before renewal.
subscription_billing_desc: Our subscription billing works as follows:
billing_cycle_monthly: Monthly subscriptions are billed on the same date each month
billing_cycle_annual: Annual subscriptions are billed once per year on your signup date
billing_auto_renew: All subscriptions auto-renew unless cancelled before the renewal date
auto_renewal_terms_desc: To provide uninterrupted service, your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each billing period.
renewal_notification_desc: We'll send you email reminders before your subscription renews:
renewal_7_days: 7 days before renewal: Reminder email with renewal amount
renewal_24_hours: 24 hours before renewal: Final reminder with option to cancel
renewal_confirmation: After renewal: Confirmation email with receipt
price_changes_desc: If we change our subscription prices, here's how it affects you:
price_notice_30_days: We provide at least 30 days notice before any price increase
price_grandfathered: Existing subscribers may be grandfathered at their current rate
price_cancel_option: You can cancel before the new price takes effect
payment_methods_desc: We accept the following payment methods:
payment_security_note: All payments are processed securely through our payment partners. We never store your full card details.
failed_payments_desc: If a payment fails, here's what happens:
failed_retry_1: We'll attempt to process the payment again after 24 hours
failed_retry_2: A second attempt is made after 3 days if the first retry fails
failed_suspension: After 7 days of failed payments, your subscription may be suspended
billing_terms_footer: By subscribing, you agree to these billing terms. You can view your billing history and manage subscriptions in Settings.
terms_payment_intro: This section covers payment-related terms for our services.
terms_payment_currency: All prices are displayed and charged in USD unless otherwise specified.
terms_payment_taxes: Prices may be subject to applicable taxes based on your location.
terms_payment_authorization: By providing payment information, you authorize us to charge your payment method for purchases.
cookie_policy_description: Learn about the cookies we use and manage your preferences
cookies_explanation: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit websites. They help us provide a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our service.
cookies_usage_explanation: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze usage patterns, and personalize content. This helps us understand what works best and continuously improve our service.
essential_cookies_desc: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled as they are necessary for security and core functionality.
functional_cookies_desc: Remember your preferences and settings to provide a personalized experience.
functional_cookies_examples: Language preferences, theme settings, display options
analytics_cookies_desc: Help us understand how you use our app so we can improve it.
analytics_cookies_examples: Page views, feature usage, performance metrics
marketing_cookies_desc: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness.
marketing_cookies_examples: Ad targeting, conversion tracking, social media integration
managing_cookies_text: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:
browser_settings: Adjust your browser settings to block or delete cookies
cookie_preferences: Use our cookie consent banner to customize your preferences
opt_out_analytics: Opt out of analytics through your privacy settings
third_party_cookies_text: Some cookies are set by third-party services that appear on our pages. We do not control these cookies. Third parties include analytics providers, advertising networks, and social media platforms.
cookie_consent_text: When you first visit our site, we ask for your consent to use non-essential cookies. You can change your preferences at any time through our cookie settings or privacy controls.
cookie_policy_updates_text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
cookie_contact_text: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us.
ccpa_rights_description: Exercise your California Consumer Privacy Act rights
ccpa_intro_text: If you are a California resident, you have specific rights regarding your personal information under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). Use this form to submit a request to exercise your rights.
personal_info_desc: Provide your information so we can verify your identity and process your request.
request_type_desc: Choose the type of CCPA right you wish to exercise.
right_to_know_desc: Request information about what personal data we collect, use, and disclose about you.
right_to_delete_desc: Request that we delete the personal information we have collected about you.
right_to_opt_out_desc: Opt out of the sale or sharing of your personal information.
right_to_portability_desc: Request a copy of your personal information in a portable format.
additional_info_desc: Provide any additional details that may help us process your request.
additional_info_placeholder: Please describe your request in more detail...
california_resident_confirmation: I confirm that I am a California resident and am entitled to make this request under CCPA.
identity_verification_confirmation: I understand that I may be required to verify my identity before this request can be processed.
california_resident_required: You must be a California resident to submit this request.
identity_verification_required: Please confirm the identity verification statement.
ccpa_request_submitted: Your CCPA request has been submitted. We will respond within 45 days.
ccpa_response_time: We will respond to your request within 45 days as required by CCPA.
